name: City Tourist Mordem Car Driving 3D
description:
Drive your fast cars through the endless highway traffic and realistic city. Experience racing life, in the car, different drive view, different scenery of traffic. Super fast car is waiting for you, quickly drive with your friends!

Control the play is easy, tilt the car, and run left or right to avoid the car in city traffic. But you need to care at the high speed, if there is danger, remember to slow down. If you believe your skill, only to tilt the car and racing with other rivals.

City Tourist Mordem Car Driving 3D Features:
-Easy to control
-Racing with rivals
-Highway drive in car
-3D view from real driver's seat
-HD graphics
-Many cars to choose
